definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: Madam Michel found her in an awkward position.
sentences.chinese: 米雪女士發現自己處於一個尷尬的境地。

sentences.english: European bond markets continued to creak as buyers remained scarce.
sentences.chinese: 由於買家稀少，歐洲債券市場仍處於勉力維持的境地。

sentences.english: He will continually bring you to times when you must trust Him.
sentences.chinese: 祂會不斷地領你走到你非信靠祂不可的境地。

sentences.english: As always, presidential unilateralism puts Congress in a tough position.
sentences.chinese: 總統的單方面決定總是置國會與難堪的境地。

sentences.english: Cambodians and other groups in San Diego were in a similar situation.
sentences.chinese: 聖地亞哥的柬埔寨人和其他團體也處於同樣境地。

sentences.english: So point one, that’s what the Cross frees us from.
sentences.chinese: 因此，第一點就是“十字架將我們從何境地解放出來。

sentences.english: Orang are currently on the verge of extinction wildly.
sentences.chinese: 猩猩現在面臨着在野外滅絕的境地。

sentences.english: The company can only go to hell in a handbasket with this damned dead-cat bounce.
sentences.chinese: 該死的死貓反彈只能使該企業的所處的境地迅疾惡化。

sentences.english: Water to the Soviet Union in the region south of the water culture in an awkward position.
sentences.chinese: 江南的多水也使蘇中地區的水源文化處於尷尬的境地。

sentences.english: As far as I know, there is no such "face-off" between China and India in the border area.
sentences.chinese: 據我瞭解，中印邊境地區目前不存在“對峙”情況。

sentences.english: The company is in dire straits.
sentences.chinese: 公司處於極度困難的境地。

sentences.english: The road will connect the border areas of the land-locked state.
sentences.chinese: 公路將把這個內陸邦的邊境地區連接起來。

sentences.english: Without it, nothing could ever be brought to a conclusion; everything would be in state of chaos.
sentences.chinese: 不準時將一事無成，事事都會陷入混亂不堪的境地。

sentences.english: Teachers are indeed caught in a dilemma.
sentences.chinese: 老師確實陷入進退兩難的境地。

sentences.english: His loftiness sends him into despair when deprived of his job.
sentences.chinese: 他的自命清高使他在下崗後陷入絕望的境地。

sentences.english: Hxdying nuclear weapons would put Iran in a much securer position.
sentences.chinese: 擁有核武器將使伊朗處於一個更爲安全的境地。

definition: stage/degree (to which a situation has evolved)/situation/leeway
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation
to sink into/to get caught up in/to land in (a predicament)
no room to advance or to retreat (idiom); without any way out of a dilemma/trapped/in an impossible situation
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
consigned to eternal damnation/with no hope of reprieve
caught in (a bad situation)/to fall into (trap etc)
